email.subject: Overseas Vote: your password has been changed.
email.body_template:
Dear $!firstName,

You have used "Forgot Password" feature of our site. Please use this link to change your password.

If the link does not work you may copy/paste the address below into your browser:

https://${serverName}/ResetPassword.htm?n=${cipherCode}

Thank you for choosing the Overseas Vote site and services to register to vote and request your ballot for the upcoming $!year elections!

With sincere regards,

~ from the volunteer team at Overseas Vote

P.S. Please help: Overseas Vote is a nonprofit, nonpartisan 501(c)(3) public charity that depends on the giving gestures of voters such as you who use our voter services - to keep these services running for you and other voters like you. Please make your donation to Overseas Vote today.

Contact us at anytime with questions and comments
